note: Growing up in a home with six women and one man, I really don't know men at all. But today at 68 years, I know my man and I know I like to take my clothes off for him and his camera. I appreciate anything handmade, especially bricolage. History, and people knowledgeable on any subject interest me. Music, animals, beauty and nature touch me most. I also like cozy old clutter, Bob Dylan, Leon Russell, Guy Clark and Townes Van Zandt.
